## d. Find the Hat Matrix

```{r}
# Set up X matrix
X_vals = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 3, 6, 4)
X = matrix( X_vals, nrow=4, ncol=2 )
X

# Set up (X * Xt)-1 Matrix (Found in Part C)
XtXinv_vals = c( -(31/67), 7/67, 7/67, -(1/134) )
XtXinv = matrix( XtXinv_vals, nrow=2, ncol=2 )
XtXinv

# Setup Xt matrix
Xt = t( X )
Xt

answer.D = X %*% XtXinv %*% Xt
answer.D
```
## e. Find b
```{r}
y_vals = c( 4.2, 2.3, 2.7, 2.0 )
Y = matrix( y_vals, nrow=4, ncol=1 )

b = XtXinv %*% Xt %*% Y
b
```

## f. Find Yhat
```{r}
H <- answer.D

Y.hat <- H %*% Y
Y.hat
```

# g. Find e

```{r}
e = Y - Y.hat
e
```
